import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
plt.scatter(df['Sleep Duration'], df['Quality of Sleep'])
plt.title('Relationship between Sleep Duration and Quality of Sleep')
plt.xlabel('Sleep Duration')
plt.ylabel('Quality of Sleep')
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

df.groupby('Occupation')['Sleep Duration'].mean().plot(kind='bar')
plt.title('Average Sleep Duration Across Different Occupations')
plt.xlabel('Occupation')
plt.ylabel('Average Sleep Duration (hours)')
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

df['Stress Level'].hist(bins=10, edgecolor='black')
plt.title('Distribution of Stress Levels Among All Individuals')
plt.xlabel('Stress Level')
plt.ylabel('Frequency')
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df['Gender'].value_counts().plot(kind='pie', autopct='%1.1f%%')
plt.title('Gender Distribution')
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

df['Heart Rate Category'] = pd.cut(df['Heart Rate'], bins=[60, 70, 80, 100], labels=['Low', 'Medium', 'High'])

average_sleep_quality = df.groupby('Heart Rate Category')['Quality of Sleep'].mean()

plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
plt.bar(average_sleep_quality.index, average_sleep_quality.values)
plt.xlabel('Heart Rate Category')
plt.ylabel('Average Quality of Sleep')
plt.title('Comparison of Average Sleep Quality by Heart Rate Range')
plt.show()

plt.ylabel('Sleep Quality')

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

df_grouped = df.groupby('Sleep Disorder')['Quality of Sleep'].mean().reset_index()

plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
plt.bar(df_grouped['Sleep Disorder'], df_grouped['Quality of Sleep'])
plt.xlabel('Sleep Disorder')
plt.ylabel('Average Quality of Sleep')
plt.title('Comparison of Average Sleep Quality with and without Sleep Disorders')
plt.show()
